role.argrole: purpose, for what usually marked with the prep. ل

example.parse: (S (VP (PRT (VERB_PART لقد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS آن) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الاوان)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تؤخذ) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM قضية) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المخيمات))) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-MNR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN محمل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجد))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to take the issue of the (refugee) camps seriously

example.arg: لان تؤخذ قضية المخيمات على محمل الجد

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS آن) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN لعراقيين))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:SJ يطمئنوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS وعد) (NP-OBJ (PVSUFF_DO:3MP هم)) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الرئيس) (NOUN_PROP جورج) (NOUN_PROP بوش)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC ساعة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الخلاص))) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اقتربت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to take comfort after president George Bush promised them that their salvation is near

example.arg: ان يطمئنوا * بعد ما وعدهم الرئيس جورج بوش بأن ساعة الخلاص قد اقتربت
